package.name: Designcomplex_Producturlkey
package.summary: autofill urlkey with attributes like manufacturer, name, sku, custom attributes, etc. on product save
package.description:
With this extension you can manage an autofill of the urlkey from all possible attributes

<strong>IMPORTANT!<strong>
This extension requires file modification for customization.

Standard setup is:
<strong>manufacturer-name-skugetData('manufacturer'))): $Url=$Url.$Product->getAttributeText('manufacturer').'-'; endif; /* Name added to urlkey */ if(!is_null($Product->getData('name'))): $Url=$Url.$Product->getData('name'); endif; /* SKU added to urlkey */ if(!is_null($Product->getData('sku'))): $Url=$Url.$Product->getData('sku').'-'; endif;
